art.author: monica
art.post: I thought of it as Adam and Eve in the Garden, the first Man and the first Woman, the first Couple, the first union of Man and Woman, the first Parents. Why would that be dark or in any way obscene?
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud

art.author: monica
art.post: You should never judge a book by its cover. Whoever told you tat Colton said God had really big wings was inaccurate. YOU should read te book for yourself and draw your OWN conclusions as to the authenticity of Colton’s experience.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
